Workflow.Name: Opportunity (Create) - Manage Dynamics 365 tab in a Team channel
Workflow.Description: Flow that will manage the creation or the update of a Dynamics 365 tab in a Team channel when an Opportunity is created depending on the value of the Originating Lead and the Parent Account fields.

LocalizedName.description: Opportunity (Create) - Manage Dynamics 365 tab in a Team channel

Description.description: Flow that will manage the creation or the update of a Dynamics 365 tab in a Team channel when an Opportunity is created depending on the value of the Originating Lead and the Parent Account fields.
